Oct. 2, 2010 D West Wales BBA Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Evan Smith (euphonium) Blaenavon. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 2, 2010, 10:57 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:20 a.m.
1 Rogerstone Band Jamie Jones Five Blooms in a Welsh Garden
2 Blaenavon Town Band Andrew Protherough Jones The Plantagenets
3 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small Variations on Laudate Dominum
4 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans Variations on Laudate Dominum
